Index >  BackgroundFillColor

BackgroundFillColor

Description

Returns or sets the fill color of the selected area of an image when it is cut, erased or rotated. It is a value specifying the 24-bit RGB value.

Data type

<int>

Syntax

.BackgroundFillColor = 0xffffff;

Remarks

Default is white (0xffffff). The byte-ordering of the 24-bit RGB value is BBGGRR. BB represents blue, GG represents green and RR represents red.

See Also

Erase()
CutToClipboard()
CutFrameToClipboard()
